mapper.select: SELECT ilban_vacation.vacation_division AS vacationDivision ,ilban_vacation.vacation_type AS vacationType ,ilban_vacation.vacation_start_date AS vacationStartDate ,ilban_vacation.vacation_end_date AS vacationEndDate ,ilban_vacation.vacation_actual_use AS vacationActualUse ,ilban_vacation.vacation_reason AS vacationReason ,ilban_vacation.vacation_approval_status AS vacationApprovalStatus ,ilban_vacation.vacation_registration_day AS vacationRegistrationDay ,haksa_department.dept_name_korean AS deptNameKorean ,haksa_job_rank.job_rank_name_korean AS jobRankNameKorean ,ilban_human.human_name AS humanName FROM ilban_vacation INNER JOIN ilban_appointment ON ilban_vacation.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number INNER JOIN ilban_human ON ilban_vacation.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_human.student_teacher_no INNER JOIN haksa_department ON ilban_appointment.dept_code = haksa_department.dept_code INNER JOIN haksa_job_rank ON ilban_appointment.rank_code = haksa_job_rank.job_rank_code ORDER BY ilban_vacation.vacation_registration_day DESC
